name: Psychonauts in the Rhombus of Ruin
description: Psychonauts in the Rhombus of Ruin is an all-new Virtual Reality adventure that takes players back into the mysterious and paranormal world of the Psychonauts for the first time in over ten years!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 or greater Processor: Intel i5-4590 processor equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 8 GB available space Additional Notes: Gamepad required, Touch as Gamepad optional
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
